text: Continental Autonomous Mobility,
what we are developing are
components that means sensors

and high power computing to
be integrated in the cars
of our customers.

But we are as well
developing software solutions
on it, which offer safety features

basically to reduce the
accidents on the street.

To develop our computer
vision algorithms, we need

to find out the petabytes
of data, the right images
that will be required for training.

Usually these are tasks that
can take hours of the time
of our machine learning experts.

With the solutions we were
developing together with AWS,

we had the chance to reduce
these times to a couple

of minutes leveraging as
well gen AI technologies,
which drives our development forward.

The solutions we have developed
together with AWS allow us

to reduce our operational
costs by around about 40%

and improve the
accuracy of algorithm by 10%.

With the solution we developed
together with AWS, we intend

to provide by 2027
automated driving trucks
on the road of the USA.

Our collaboration with
AWS is full of trust,

so we are developing the
solutions to our customers,
but they are here basically

to support us in
understanding our use cases

and always here as well to
optimize these solutions
to be a successful story in the cloud.
